headline: Constellation Brands (STZ) Traded Lower Due to Slower Growth
summary: Artisan Partners, an investment management company, released its “Artisan Mid Cap Value Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, the fund’s Investor Class fund ARTQX returned 0.97%, Advisor Class fund APDQX posted a return of 0.98%, and Institutional Class fund APHQX returned 0.97%, compared to […]

headline: A Look At Constellation Brands (STZ) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Ongoing Beer Strength
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) is back in focus after quarterly results topped Wall Street expectations, with its beer portfolio, including Modelo and Corona, driving performance, and management leaning into premium brands and ongoing share repurchases. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. The quarterly beat has given Constellation Brands a short burst of momentum, with a 1-day share price return of 2.33% and 7-day share price return of 1.92%. However, the 1-year total shareholder...

headline: Beer Strength And Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In Constellation Brands (STZ)
summary: Constellation Brands recently reported quarterly results that exceeded Wall Street expectations on both revenue and earnings, driven primarily by ongoing strength in its Modelo and Corona beer portfolio and reinforced by continued share repurchases and a focus on premium offerings. This combination of outperformance in the beer segment and management’s emphasis on returning cash to shareholders adds fresh context to earlier concerns about slower organic sales and capital allocation...
